title: MY FIRST GAME AND A AFK WARNING
body:
FIRST GAME STARTED

1:4 plain boxes along side my character game crashes
2: Reconnects and well screen goes BLACK !!!!
3:4 plain boxes along side my character game connects well i wont lie i had a shitty game (I HAD NO IDEA WHAT I WAS DOING )

ANYWAYS after the game! i got a AFK warning

I have played CRICKET & FOOTBALL GAMES ONLINE without quitting single one of them now all of a sudden i am considered a quitter because the game crashes and sometimes goes BLACK!

i am no longer going to play LOL because what if this happens again (MOST PROBABLY I WILL BE BANNED AND I DONT WANT THAT)

replies.body:
It happens a bit to early accounts when they dc because leave busters is like a bot operated security system as soon as you dc it will pick it up and after that game it will warn you.
Expect it until like lvl 5
